Body:
exp_p1 = np.array([610 / self.screen_width, (self.screen_height - 190) /
    self.screen_height])
exp_p2 = np.array([610 / self.screen_width, (self.screen_height - 890) /
    self.screen_height])
exp_p3 = np.array([1310 / self.screen_width, (self.screen_height - 890) /
    self.screen_height])
exp_p4 = np.array([1310 / self.screen_width, (self.screen_height - 190) /
    self.screen_height])
exp_array = np.array([exp_p2, exp_p3, exp_p4])
pix_p1 = self.cam.get_texture_coords_for_vertices(self.p1)
pix_p2 = self.cam.get_texture_coords_for_vertices(np.array([self.p2, self.
    p3, self.p4]))
try:
    np.testing.assert_almost_equal(pix_p1, exp_p1)
    np.testing.assert_almost_equal(pix_p2, exp_array)
    res = True
except AssertionError as err:
    res = False
    print(err)
self.assertTrue(res)
